article.headline: N.C. State 87, East Carolina 76
article.story: RALEIGH, N.C. -- Brandon Costner had 24 points and 17 rebounds to help North Carolina State beat East Carolina 87-76 on Wednesday night. Ben McCauley added 20 points for the Wolfpack (6-1), who used Javi Gonzalez's running heave from halfcourt just before halftime to start a game-turning 18-2 spurt. N.C. State shot 52 percent for the game and led by as many as 16 points in the second half before holding off a late rally to avenge last year's road loss. Brock Young scored 25 points to lead the Pirates (8-2), who got as close as four points in the final 3 minutes but couldn't complete the comeback. East Carolina upset N.C. State 75-69 last year in Greenville, beating the Wolfpack for the first time in 18 meetings and earning its first win in 58 tries against an Atlantic Coast Conference program.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
